title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 574 - Standards for the Review of Projects Pursuant to the Adirondack Park Agency Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 574 - Standards for the Review of Projects Pursuant to the Adirondack Park Agency Act

State Regulations
§ 574.1 - General rule
§ 574.2 - Consultations with agency technical staff
§ 574.3 - Sign standards
§ 574.4 - Wastewater Treatment System Standards
§ 574.5 - Further definitions of the development considerations
§ 574.6 - Conformance with local land use controls
§ 574.7 - Application of the overall intensity guidelines
§ 574.8 - Conversion of resort hotels, rental cottages and group camps

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 574

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 15-2709[1], 24- 0805, 24-0903[5]; Executive Law, §§
804[9], 809[14]; art. 27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
